data.name: Axel Vasquez
data.profile: As a self-taught developer, I have always been passionate about the tech industry since I was a child. I began programming in 2018 and have been fascinated by the endless possibilities it offers ever since. I am a curious person by nature and enjoy constantly learning new things.
